comment_text: Excellent service
Nice service

Absolutely amazing, we arrived outside the terminal doors of Manchester airport & within 2 minutes our chauffeur was there to collect the car.
We returned in the early hours of the morning and again the service was superb.
Friendly people to deal with, excellent rates, no lugging heavy cases about a great way to begin and end our holiday.
Would definitely recomend. Thank you again guys
First time of using this car parking service, but will definitely use it again as it is so convenient. Efficient service when dropping off and collecting. Would recommend without hesitation.

you know when you think should I shouldnt I? Well do as i did and use this service from Manchester! im a first time user but believe me,its pretty damn good,you get emails confirming details,good prices, good service,polite staff,instructions,locations and good timing. Drop offs and collections were quick and easy and its so good knowing that by the time your out of the baggage hall your car is on its way.
I will use this service again whenever i can, its impressive. (And i told them so too) Thanks guys.
Great that they met us straight away with the car making the journey home a little easier. Good value
Excellent , there when i arrived and car was waiting upon my return fantastic service, would highly recommend

On looking for cheap parking at Manchester this was the cheapest, which I found surprising as was described as 'luxury chauffeur'. It did not disappoint. I called ahead of schedule and was told to call again once I was parked outside the terminal. I did so and a man arrived within about 2 minutes to take my car. On the return journey they were there within less than 5 minutes. Would definitely recommend for price and service :)
Fantastic service definetly worth money
Good service. Will book gain

Amazingly efficient service. A quick call when 20 minutes from the airport and drove straight to drop off zopne to be met by a pleasant and polite driver who simply took my keys and drove off leaving us under cover at the departures entrance. On return I again made a quick call after collecting our luggage and within 5 mins of reaching the same drop off point our car appeared with another polite driver. Lovely - the car was already warmed up and we were out of the airport and on our way while others were probably still in the baggage hall (or waiting on their courtesy bus to take them to their car) First class service at a great price. Well Done!

The service we received from you was generally very good, my recommendation to improve would be to improve your information about where to meet your drop off driver when you arrive at the airport, we don't usually use Manchester (its our 2nd choice airport) so don't know the layout and the man we spoke to on the phone didn't give clear instructions to the signs we were seeing at the airport, also he never helped in the slightest getting our luggage out even though that is stated on your web site, I'm disabled and that would have been a big help, however the man who met us on our return was the complete opposite, he was brilliant and helped us no end, he was a real asset for your company. overall though next time we travel from Manchester we will use you again as it is so much better than having to load and unload onto a bus to get to some car park five mile away.
excellent, pompt, efficient, friendly.

Having read some of the reviews about LCS / Park and Go we were a little apprehensive that the service might not be as we would want. There was no need to worry, the pick up was smooth with us only having to wait 4 - 5 minutes and the pick-up was even better, 2 minutes from when we arrived at the meeting point. Car was fine and mileage showed it had only been driven a short distnce from the airport. So on our first experience, LCS delivered, it was really convenient after a 4 hour flight with a 1.5 hour drive home and we'd certainly use them again.
A very good prompt service but didn't advise we were to go back to departures on return.This did not cause too much of a problem.
Would use this service again .... despite being delayed over an hour on our return to the UK my car was brought back to me in a relatively quick time even though it was 2 am !

The service was excellent.They were waiting for me at the airport on arrival to take my car and then when I returned my car was brought within 5 mins of calling them. will definately use this company again.
Had a great experience with this company, had absolutely no problems whatsoever dropping car off, and then picking the car up was easy and faultless. The driver was prompt, and cheerful.
Excellent prompt service. Polite and helpful drivers. Fair price. Would definitely use this service again.

I will keep this review short and sweet.  The service LCS Meet & Greet is second to none. It is professional, smooth and cost effective.  They run a very professional operation which allows frequent travellers like myself huge peace of mind when planning to get to and from the Airport.  I highly recommend their service which is faultless. Thanks Guys!
Fantastic service. Did exactly as requested and promised. I would use this service every time we fly from now on.
Excellent service from Drop off to collection. Would highly recommend to friends and family
I have used this service several times and highly recommend LCS Manchester.  Always on time, and never any problem.  Keep up the good work.

Good service as usual.
Hopefully we will use you again in May

Fantastic service and very reasonably priced.  Very pleasant and helpful over the phone when booking.  All instructions were easy to follow and very helpful.  Within minutes of arriving at Manchester airport, we were greeted by our chauffeur who did a thorough check of our vehicle and gave us plenty of reassurance that our car would be very well looked after while we were away.  As soon as we got through immigration, we rang through for our car and it took a matter of minutes.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend LCS - in fact I will be booking again with them very soon for a holiday in September!!

Excellent service Driver arrived within 2mins of us arriving at Terminal & very Pleasant . the same when we returned
1st time user but will use every time from now on and also Reccomend to freinds & Family

Excellent on arrival, we were met as soon as we arrived next to the Departures.
Unacceptable on return. Landed at 10.30pm and we had to wait 45 minutes after notifying Office of our arrival for our car to be returned. Very frustrating watching other 'meet and greet' clients getting their vehicles.

As per your email to me I'd like to write a review.  The service was excellent and I would recommend such.  My only issue was not being able to 'identify' the driver.  Perhaps they could carry some Identification with them?  I had to contact the office to confirm who was meeting me / description of such as the collector did not have any identification on him relating to your company. On saying this they were on time, no hassle and I'd definately use the service again.  Thanks You.
Polite, on time, efficient and as ever great service; we will continue to access this convenient and safe approach to airport parking at Manchester

Meet & Greet at Manchester Airport is an excellent service - it is so easy to use,  and just great to pull up outside our Terminal, unload our luggage and walk straight in!   And we are always met by a smiling, cheerful member of staff.
Great service. Competitive price and much more convenient than walking or getting bus to car park

I have used LCS on at least 6 occoasions and have always had excellent service. The convenience of being met at the airport arrivals on the outward leg and then being met on our return is so much better than parking at an off-airport site and bussing in to the airport. I wouldn't do it any other way!

Fantastic service, we were running late due to an accident, I contacted LCS to notify them and I was assured that it was not a problem just ring back 10 minute out and they would be there to meet me,, this they did.
I have used this service three times now and never had a problem, fantastic service with courteous people, can't recomend them enough.
I have used Manchester meet and great twice now and find the service easy and stress free.

As usual a first class service. It takes all the stress out of finding a parking space and lugging your luggage to the departure lounge. The staff are very helpful and keep you informed.

I will definitely use them again, I think that would be my fourth time.

Have used LCS Manchester many times and will continue to do so.  The service they provide is superb.  Good communication; friendly & efficient service.  Why would you want the hassle of "park & ride" when you can leave your car outside the terminal and just walk in and check-in!  Feels even better on return after a long flight or the end of a perfect holiday - no queues for the shuttle bus; exit terminal and your car is ready & waiting. Good work LCS and long may you continue.

We have used this meet and greet service now for the last 2 years. Absolutly brilliant, there is no other way to travel. I would highly recommend to anyone travelling via Manchester airport. Will certainly be using again later this year. Thanks guys for a fantastic service.

This is a great service from start to finish also taking our twins to the airport in our own means they traveled in there child saftey seats added bonus .met them handed car over straight into airport. On our return they was waiting for us upstairs so we got 30 min later after coming out  of the airport

Used this service for the first time last year and will always use in the future. Certainly beats leaving your car in a car park and then having to find it on your return!

Picked up the car from us outside the departure hall and returned it at arrivals - what could be better. The driver had even put the heating on full in readiness for our return on a cold early morning.

I have used this company on two occasions now and have been very pleased with the service they provide.My only comment I will make is that when I received my car back on the last occasion after packing the car with our luggage ,which took a few minutes.I proceeded to set off when there was one loud clanging noise.On inspection it seemed the vehicle had been returned to me with the exhaust hanging down.I tried to contact the company without success and after eventually getting home it cost me £80 to have it rectified.Had the driver who returned it to me had mentioned the noise which he must have known about I could have made a temporary repair at the airport.

I used this service for the first time last year and found it to be the simplest way to park at Manchester Airport. We called the company when we were a short distance from the airport and when we arrived at the terminal, a driver was waiting to take our car. When we subsequently arrived back in the UK a call to the company resulted in our car being outside waiting for us to drive home. I have already recommended this service to a friend who used it and was equally happy with the service provided. I will definitely use the service in the future.

I don't travel often, l don't use computers often but everything was very easy and very straightforward. LCS do absolutely what they say they will. Brilliant service and brilliant prices. 
Would thoroughly recommend.
Brilliant service. Hassle free and not expensive. We have used LCS several times and will do so again. Have recommended this meet and greet parking to our friends.
I have used the LCS service many times and am extremely impressed with the overall experience, customer service and the simplicity that this adds to traveling especially with the kids!

This company rescued us when another company (Premier parking) failed to show up. They met us at Manchester Airport within ten minutes of hearing about our crisis.

When we returned almost 2hrs after our scheduled time, they still returned our car to us within 5 minutes. 

Really nice guys too.
First time user in 2014, excellent service, driver was polite and ontime for both collection and delivery. Will certainly be using in 2015
Have used this service many times, and have never been disappointed. Brilliant service. Very efficient. No hassle looking for parking space, and the price is very reasonable.

Brilliant service. We have used LCS many times and have always received a first class service whatever the time of day or night. The staff are always, helpful, friendly and courteous. We have recommended this company to many friends and colleagues.

Wow!!  Never used valet parking before....but will never go back.  Extremely convenient service and hassle free.  Drivers very polite and you know your car is in safe hands.  Highly highly recommended!!!!

Fantastic service, will definitely use again.
Thanks again

Used for the first time this year after falling out with my previous service after 10 years. Found this company polite prompt and exactly what I expect. Have just booked to use them again and will continue to do so.
Keep up the good work guys

I have used this service many times. The staff are always prompt and polite, the price is good and the service excellent. This makes the start and end of my journey easy and hassle-free. I recommend them to every-one

We have used LCS several times at Manchester Airport and have always received a very good service. It compares favourably with all other valet parking companies at major  airports and is very reasonably priced. We would have no hesitation in recommending LCS and have done so many times.

whilst the take away and return of the car was very good indeed, it was only when we had left the airport after collecting our car that we realised that whoever had used it had put 29 miles on the clock.  Also, after we had left, we noticed a footmark on the upright between the passenger door and the windscreen.  The car also smelled of smoke.  There were two 1 cm deep scratches over the driver's and passengers door, which admittedly we didn't notice when we left the airport, and I am assuming, whether rightly or not, they could have been  made by the studs on the back pocket of a pair of jeans.

None of this was noticed on collection of the car, as the chaos outside terminal three was almost overwhelming.

First time I have used this system and company . I have got to say it was fantastic everything was so easy and to be in the car 45 minutes after landing says it all. Thank you we will definitely use this again. A first class service
Brilliant service and so easy to contact. Thank you.
Excellent service - used for the first time but will deffo use again!
First time I'd used this service but highly recommended. Very convenient and we'll priced compared to on airport parking. Will use again.
The car was picked up and delivered at the most convenient place in the arrivals area, and it all worked perfectly.
Very good Service will use them again

after being let down a week before by a car park provider (which I booked through groupon) I had to go and find another car park.  LCS were fantastic - great service, efficient on were there when they said they would be.  also a good price too compared to competitors. I will be using them again
Great service, would definitely use again, no hanging around what so ever.

I have been using the excellent services of LCS for more than a year now.
Your efficiency and cost-effectiveness is impressive.
What puts the icing on the cake, however, is the knowledge (and sense of comfort) that - after a long-haul flight programme (often over 18 hours in total) - my car will be there promptly with formalities at a minimum.
Keep up the great work and thank you!
I really apreciated the service. Very good. Recommend
Excellent service will be booking again in the future
i rate this firm 5* because they always answered phone first time ;they were there when i arrived and were there within  two mintute on return ;even helped with suitcases  1CLASS
Brilliant customer service. Already recommended my folks use this meet and greet service when they do away next month and i'll certainly be using again too. Thank you.
excellent service highly reccomend

Absolutely fabulous service. Rang 15 mins away from airport meet and greet guy was waiting. Then rang them in baggage area and when we got outside he was waiting. Cheaper than any parking available or train. Will always use these guys now would be crazy not to.

Brilliant service. Very friendly staff. Second time I've used them and have now decided I will use them every time I travel from Manchester Airport! Takes the stress out of travelling. Thanks very much
Look no further for parking, 5 stars this time and every time. Please stay as you are and don't get sucked up by the NCPs of this world. World class service , thanks.

excellent customer service - would definately recommend - gents were waiting for us at both ends collection and delivery  - no hanging around which was great especially after a long flight  - thanks for the superb service
Excellent service once again. Wouldn't choose anything else

Left my car in an immaculate condition. It was returned covered in bird muck, when I asked why the driver said it was not his fault. I asked for a full refund only got half. The boss said it was not his fault it was the birds!!! I will definitely never use again.
I couldn't recommend these guys highly enough, they were prompt, polite and made traveling with a 4 month old infinitely easier and totally hassle free. I'll definitely be using these again.

I have used LCS Manchester ' Meet and Greet' several times, on each occasion they have given an excellent service, I have not had to wait around, both at my departure, and arrival, as their kind and courteous drivers were always waiting for me.
I would not hesitate to recommend them to my friends.

A truly 5* service.
Highly recommended .I found no faults with the service and it was nice to be met at the airport with my car to take the stress out of my Long Haul flight

Having found LCS about 2 years ago from a chance recommendation we have used them on 4 or 5 occasions so far and can confirm that the service is second to none, even in winter when there was 50mm of snow on the ground and MC airport was in chaos LCS was there on time and took our car.

We cannot praise them highly enough, in these days of shabby and unreliable service LCS are a shining beacon of class and reliability. To top it all you will be lucky to get the service any cheaper anywhere else.
5* Service again, makes going on Holiday so easy. Drive up and Drive away on your return. Brilliant.

When will these guys get it wrong ? Never is the answer, I have used LCS so many times now and every time the timing and service is perfect. Every time I get near the airport it seems like the car is going away not me, I'm it looks forward to the stay at LCS. Use LCSwhat I say , 6 stars out of 5 every time

This is the first time we've used LCS Meet and Greet but we'll definitely be using them again. The service was excellent with great communication and friendly, efficient drivers. Hassle free  pick up and delivery- just what you need before and after a long haul flight.  Highly recommended.
We used LCS twice this summer and we were not disappointed. Efficient and professional with personable staff. Very convenient process and reasonably priced. Highly recommended
Excellent service, no hanging around... Would highly recommend & will definitely be using again in th future....
First time I've used this service and I  have to say that I will  certainly use it again. Smooth, faultless service. Well done guys!
amazing service, could not fault it will use again
An excellent service. Always on time with friendly and courteous staff.

I had made a late booking which somehow got lost in the ether.
Despite this the driver met me at the airport within 5 minutes of my arrival. The collection was equally prompt. My bags were late off the carousel and they called me to check everything was ok. 
Highly recommended

We come back time after time and we have always had an excellent service. The drivers have always been friendly and efficient.
I would highly recommend it makes going on holiday much easier.

Just returned from a week away and would definitely use this company again!

staff were friendly and efficient and price was best out there too
This is the 2nd time we have used LCS Meet and Greet and it was fantastically professional and staff friendly and helpful both times. Will be using again and will recommend to friends and family.
First time we have used the service it was excellent no waiting around staff was very friendly will certainly use them again.
Excellent service, hassle free and no more expensive than park and ride.  Will definitely book with LCS in future.  Drivers very courteous and helpful. Thank you

Excellent service!!

Used this company for our recent holiday, the driver was at the terminal within a few minutes, and again the same prompt arrival on our return. Could not fault this service at all!

Also, the driver was even willing to take the car to get some petrol as the low fuel light came on just as we got to the airport. Fabulous customer service, would recommend to everyone!!

I just wish LCS would do something wrong for once then I could offer a moan! But again and again they come up with a first class service. Used LCS for years now and never have they let me down unlike other Manchester Airport based companies. You just know that your pride and joy will be safely parked and returned in the condition you would want it returned in. Please keep it up and thanks again.

I have used lcs for the last two and had no problems. I came back from Amsterdam last w'end and had to wait nearly fourty minutes for my car. The guy said it was a lot traffic that was the problem, but when the guy drop my car off it was the same guy as I saw leave half an hour ago. There must have been only one person working because when I left there was no traffic, but it still made me late picking my children up, I was not happy!!

I have used LCS for meet and greet at Manchester Airport on a number of trips. Always courteous, there when they say they will be.....simple to book and use, a first class service and great value for money.  Highly recommend using LCS.
I have used this service many times and it is always excellent, can highly recommend will continue to use .
This is the first time I have used LCS Meet and Greet, the service was excellent, staff friendly and very helpful. Will  be using again.
Meet and greet, very professional , no time wasting, excellent service.
Very pleased we were met on time Driver very friendly.
I have used this service twice now and I have to say it is an excellent professional service I can highly recommend it and I will definitely using them again.
Very good as usual , always use LCS when we travel
Very Good Service, Everything went exactly to plan with speedy service and courteous staff

I have used LCS numerous times and have always been very impressed with the service. No waiting, it's the best in the business. I would have no hesitation in recommending them to anyone and have done on several occasions. Will definitely be using again, I never even think of using anyone else.

The first time I've used this company & the service was excellent,I will definitely use them again.
Thank you.
As usual a great service that we will continue to use and recommend.
First class service,we will defininitly use again

used LCS before and have always been satisfied with the prompt service even when returning in the early hours of the morning.One slight negative is the drivers can look a little scruffy which is not good as they are representing the company and first impressions etc

We always use LCS. The are very reliable and efficient. No more waiting for the shuttle bus to transfer you from a distant offsite car park. No freezing waits in the small hours. Great value for money.

This is the third time we have used the service and have only the highest praise. We dropped the car off this time and went in to the terminal to find to our horror that one of the passports was missing. The company were excellent and brought the car straight back allowing us to go back and get the passport. We expected an extra charge but none was made.  It was considerably more expensive than last year but I guess this is the kind of service you are paying for and the extra charge makes it oath while.
First time using this service, very impressed.  Will not hesitate to use LCS again.

Excellent service - only a short wait at drop-off during a busy lunchtime - and on the return collection, they arrived before we did!  Booked LCS last minute as our usual provider was fully booked - what a result - LCS were much more efficient than the company we have previously used and we will definitely use them again.
excellent prompt service will definitely use again.
First time I've used this service.  It came highly recommended to me and I would certainly recommend LCS to anyone.  Fantastic service, no waiting, great staff.

Called 15 minutes before arrival and a polite chap was there as we pulled up, then called as soon as we had cleared customs when we returned and the same chap pulled up 5 minutes later.

A stress free parking experience - thank you!

We used this service for the first time for our Cyprus holiday this month.  It was excellent.
We won't be bothering with taxis in future.
We would highly recommend it to anyone.

Excellent service. Prompt and friendly. 
Makes travelling a pleasure.
Very good price and easy to meet and pick car up
I have used meet and great services at other airports however this was by far the best. Will gladly use again and recommend.
Used  LCS Meet & Greet several times before. Always a prompt & reliable service. Will be giving them a call in the not too distant future.

Great service and value with friendly LCS people at Manchester. Only comment is that on my return trip once I had passed customs with my suitcase, I was told my car would be about 5 mins - I waited more like 10-15 mins. Only a minor issue. would definitely use again.

Always used before but would definitely re consider doing so again. Dropped my car off on Friday and booked to pick up on Saturday late evening. However car was parked on Friday but  at what appears to be just a leisure centre car park. It was then moved on Saturday at 14.30 despite pick up time being 8.30pm and just parked at what appears to be side of road on Industrial estate. It was then moved again to nearer the airport at 17.00 still 3 and half hours before my collection time. Not very happy at all and would appreciate some explanation
Fantastic service, no waiting around. Would highly recommend to anyone.
10/10 HIGHLY recommend. Very efficient service! Would never bother with airport parking again.. Meet & Greet is the only way for us in future.  THANK YOU
Excellent service, met on time for departure, a bit of a wait on arrival, altogether staff very good.

First class service drop off and pick up both done with the minimum of fuss.We were late for drop off because of traffic problems but the man was there when we arrived . Pick up was also impressive we had a wait of about 5 minutes . I would say this is the best company we have used for meet and greet service ,
Used your service dozens of times - always tops. You guys should introduce a loyalty discount scheme though
Great experience many thanks

Very impressed. Used other meet and greet services before but     disappointed with their service.  LCS arrived on time,  no waiting around ; driver could have been a bit more pleasant but nothing to be concerned about.  On return the car was actually already at the meeting point and the driver was really pleasant. Overall great value for money and would recommend them.
excellent service. Used twice now and will use again.
Wouldn't consider any other way of parking at Manchester!
Five star best service I have used and will ensure I use again next time I am at the airport. They beat me to the drop off point on arrival and pick up no extra time added. Perfect
Excellent service as usual very polite staff will use again

Appalling and insulting service given by 2 very unprofessional men this afternoon. The front seat of our car was soaking wet and when we approached the chauffeur and the "boss" we were told it was our fault we must of left a window open-which was funny as it was closed when we left it and closed when we picked it up!! Will be making a formal complaint.

Absolutely brilliant service as always. 
Extremely efficient and prompt. We have and will always use LCS.
Excellent service.  We have used LCS 4 times this year and always been very happy.  Getting through on the phone is sometimes a bit hit and miss but the service is excellent.
Very good service and punctual
Excellent service. Would highly recomment. Hastle free.
Excellent prompt service
After using other meet and greet services at Manchester Airport what an absolute breath of fresh air using LCS,a superb service and great value for money,will always use them from here on in.

Excellent service from start to finish, my first time using this service but most definitely not my last.
Booking on the website couldn't be easier, Confirmation email sent then followed up with a reminder before travelling to make sure everything is understood.
Easy to follow instructions on what to do on departure and arrival and all carried out with professionalism.
I really can't stress what a great service this is and I would highly recommend that you use this each time you travel from Manchester if you want a stress free holiday.
Eccellent efficient service. Definately going to use again and recommend to friends.

This was our 1st time in using a meet and greet service,and we will definately be using LCS again in the near future. The staff were punctual, polite and very helpful. An excellent all round efficient service from confirmation email to return car collection.
I have used this service on quite a few occasions so that speaks for itself. . Booking on the website is very easy. Valet service also good and reasonably priced.
1st class service.

Used the service in December again, this is about the fourth time I've used it now. Wouldn't do anything else - can't fault it. Came home on Christmas morning and the chap was waiting there all bright and cheery just like every other time I've had my car returned to me. Great service.

Drop off straightforward, but very disappointing pick up at Manchester on 27/12.  The phone was engaged constantly when I tried to call after landing. Then I had to wait almost half an hour for my car to arrive - I had to phone again to check that my car was coming.  It simply isn't good enough to say, as they did, that they had been very busy.  I certainly don't feel I received the service that I paid for.  Taking one of the frequent buses to any one of the many carparks would have been quicker and less stressful.
Brilliant so easy and stress free highly recommend. Thank you
Service is excellent and way better than the other providers. Used for over a year now and have never let me down. Only tiny glitch this time was they could not do a valet over Christmas.
Excellent service as always, I am a regular user and have  always been very pleased would highly recommend
Great service again used for 3-4 years no problems.
Excellent Service as always and would definitely recommend LCS to everyone. The process is really easy and they are always punctual.  Would not use any other company.
I have used this company many times - always excellent service and good value - Paul Horrocks

Thank you for this excellent service which made our journey so easy. Having travelled from Newcastle we were met at the airport entrance with no haste then on return our car was waiting for us. The two gentlemen who met us were so polite and helpful.
I can not think of a better way to park ones car.

Service was excellent but unfortunately someone had been smoking in our car and had left the lighter loose in the car and changed all the heating settings.  Not really acceptable but not happened before.  May not use your service again due to this.

Perfect service as always. Courteous staff, bang on time and very flexible if there's problems with flights and they're by far the cheapest around. I've used them 5 times now and wouldn't use anyone else. Thanks guys.
Great Service, would recommend to anyone.

Second time we have used this service at Manchester and cannot fault it in any way.  Prompt collection and delivery. Polite staff. Excellent value for money. Car well looked after.  Will definitely use again.

We've used the service a number of times now and they're faultless. Very polite and efficient staff. I especially appreciated my car being warm when we collecting it last week.
Thank you so much for offering a great service at the best price available.
Excellent service. I've used this service for years but regularly over the last year. The staff are always friendly and efficient. I would recommend to anyone. Thank you
Very happy with service will definitly use again later this year. I have also recommended you to freinds and rela(ives.
First time I've use this company really pleased first class ZNWHSB
Always very reliable and much cheaper than a cab each way.

Can't fault this service - very reasonably priced with efficient and friendly staff. They are always where they say they are going to be, when they say they will be and nothing has ever happened to our car. Will definitely use them again.
Have used the service many times and always found it efficent and reliable-no problems.
Excellent as always, so easy especially after an overnight flight, thank you
Excellent service and always on time
Brilliant service as always.

Used this service for several years with no issues whatsoever.
Happy Shopper!
Used lcs a few times and found them to be always professional and punctual . If you want hassle free parking I would highly recommend them. I will definitely use them again.
Excellent service. Always on time. I would never use any other parking now. Thank you!
Excellent service

Collection and delivery went like a Japanese car.
We like the car being warm when we come back!
Until we meet again, thank you.
Great Service -as ever. Courteous and human staff. What more could you ask for!
Excellent service. Very efficient. Will deffinately use this service again. Highly recommended.
Excellent service. Very efficient. Will deffinately use this service again. Highly recommended.
Bang on time and very helpful
Excellent service and hassle free as always

Absolutely brilliant service, as always. Have used many Meet N Greet, and this company is by far the best. Always on time and efficient, and will only use this company in the future. Well done again LCS.
Competitive price, great service, highly recommend
Frustrating half hour wait at drop off for car to be collected.  Not what you want when you are on your way to check in.Service on return was excellent.  No waiting, car already warm on a cold night!
First class and punctual as always - thank you

Absolutely delighted with your service, wouldn't hesitate to recommend you and I will certainly use you again .
Very well done.
Fantastic service, very efficient, friendly and professional as ever.
Fantastic service. Prompt, reliable and value for money. Would wholeheartedly recommend to anyone!
Another excellent experience with courteous staff March 16
Great service, made everything very easy for that part of our journey. Would definitely use again.

Having used LCS through an agent earlier this year, I was really pleased with the service provided.  As a result, I used LCS a second time but dealt with them direct.

The service provided was very good as I didn’t have long to wait and the chauffeurs were pleasant enough.

However, when I received my vehicle back, I noticed that it had travelled 118 miles during the time it was in LCS’s possession.  There was also a stain on the driver’s wing mirror that looked like phlegm and a chip on the bottom of the windscreen which I’m sure wasn’t there previously.

Having read poor press coverage about meet and greet services in Manchester this year, I was happy that I’d found a professional company in LCS and had recommended them to friends and family after first using them.

I am really disappointed this time and would like to know where my car has been whilst I was away, will I be reimbursed for the fuel used and why the ‘phlegm’ hadn’t been removed prior to me receiving it back so that I didn’t have to look at it on my journey home.

The service provided was good but the ‘behind the scenes’ activity was unacceptable.  As the meet and greet service was cheaper than using a taxi, the cost of the fuel used during my absence makes it about the same price.

In future, I will be using a taxi with the peace of mind that my car will be off the road and remain clean whilst I am away.

All in all, I am disappointed and will not be using or recommending LCS again.
